00034         public static function getTYPO3Root() {
00035                 $path = t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('SCRIPT_FILENAME');
00036                 $path = str_replace("/index.php","",$path);
00037                 return $path;

00047         protected static function markersCountAsSet($markers, $conditionValue) {
00048                 
00049                 // Find first || or && or !
00050                 $pattern = '/(_*([A-Za-z0-9]+)_*(\|\||&&)_*([^_]+)_*)|(_*(!)_*([A-Za-z0-9]+))/';
00051                 
00052                 session_start();
00053                 // recurse if there are more
00054                 if( preg_match($pattern, $conditionValue, $matches) ){
00055                         $isset = isset($markers['###' . $matches[2] . '###']);
00056                         if($matches[3] == '||' && $isset) {
00057                                 $return = true;
00058                         } elseif($matches[3] == '||' && !$isset) {
00059                                 $return = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs.php:: markersCountAsSet($markers, $matches[4]);
00060                         } elseif($matches[3] == '&&' && $isset) {
00061                                 $return = F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs.php:: markersCountAsSet($markers, $matches[4]);
00062                         } elseif($matches[3] == '&&' && !$isset) {
00063                                 $return = false;
00064                         } elseif($matches[6] == '!' && !$isset) {
00065                                 return !(isset($markers['###' . $matches[7] . '###']) && $markers['###' . $matches[7] . '###'] != '');
00066                         } elseif($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode'] == 1) {
00067                                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage("Invalid format of ISSET Marker. Hint: " . $matches[2]);
00068                         }
00069                 } else {
00070                         
00071                         // remove underscores
00072                         $pattern = '/_*/';
00073                         $str = preg_replace($pattern, $str, '');
00074                         
00075                         // end of recursion
00076                         $return = isset($markers['###' . $conditionValue . '###']) && ($markers['###' . $conditionValue . '###'] != '');
00077                 }
00078                 return $return;
00079         }

00091         public static function substituteIssetSubparts($subpart,$markers = array()){
00092                 $flags = array();
00093                 $nowrite = false;
00094                 $out = array();
00095                 foreach(split(chr(10), $subpart) as $line){
00096                 
00097                         // works only on it's own line
00098                         $pattern = '/###ISSET_+([^#]*)_*###/';
00099                         
00100                         // set for odd ISSET_xyz, else reset
00101                         if(preg_match($pattern, $line, $matches)) {
00102                                 if(!$flags[$matches[1]]) { // set
00103                                         $flags[$matches[1]] = true;
00104                 
00105                                         // set nowrite flag if required until the next ISSET_xyz
00106                                         // (only if not already set by envelop)
00107                                         if((!$this->markersCountAsSet($markers, $matches[1])) && (!$nowrite)) {
00108                                                 $nowrite = $matches[1];
00109                                         }
00110                                 } else { // close it
00111                                         $flags[$matches[1]] = false;
00112                                         if($nowrite == $matches[1]) {
00113                                                 $nowrite = 0;
00114                                         }
00115                                 }
00116                         } else { // It is no ISSET_line. Write if permission is given.
00117                                 if(!$nowrite) {
00118                                         $out[] = $line;
00119                                 }
00120                         }
00121                 }
00122                 $out = implode(chr(10),$out);
00123                 
00124                 return $markers;
00125         }

00134                 return t3lib_div::getIndpEnv('TYPO3_SITE_URL');

00150         public static function sanitizePath($path) {
00151                 if(substr($path,0,1) != "/") {
00152                         $path = "/".$path;
00153                 }
00154                 if(substr($path,strlen($path)-1) != "/" && !strstr($path,".")) {
00155                         $path = $path."/";
00156                 }
00157                 return $path;
00158         }
00159         
00169         public static function getFilledLangMarkers(&$template,$langFile) {
00170                 $GLOBALS['TSFE']->readLLfile($langFile);
00171                 $langMarkers = array();
00172                 if ($langFile != '') {
00173                         $aLLMarkerList = array();
00174                         preg_match_all('/###LLL:.+?###/Ssm', $template, $aLLMarkerList);
00175                         
00176                         foreach($aLLMarkerList[0] as $LLMarker){
00177                                 $llKey =  strtolower(substr($LLMarker,7,strlen($LLMarker)-10));
00178                                 $marker = $llKey;
00179                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'] = trim($GLOBALS['TSFE']->sL($llKey));
00180                                 $langMarkers['###LLL:'.strtoupper($marker).'###'] = $langMarkers['###LLL:'.$marker.'###'];
00181                         }
00182                 }
00183             return $langMarkers;
00184         }
00185         
00194         public static function getFilledValueMarkers(&$gp) {
00195                 if (isset($gp) && is_array($gp)) {
00196                         foreach($gp as $k=>$v) {
00197                                 if (!ereg('EMAIL_', $k)) {
00198                                         if (is_array($v)) {
00199                                                 $v = implode(',', $v);
00200                                         }
00201                                         $v = trim($v);
00202                                         if ($v != "") {
00203                                                 if(get_magic_quotes_gpc()) {
00204                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = stripslashes(self::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v));
00205                                                 } else {
00206                                                         $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = self::reverse_htmlspecialchars($v);
00207                                                 }
00208                                         } else {
00209                                                 $markers['###value_'.$k.'###'] = '';
00210                                         }
00211                                 } //if end
00212                         } // foreach end
00213                 } // if end
00214                 return $markers;
00215         }
00216         
00225         public static function reverse_htmlspecialchars($mixed) {
00226                 $htmltable = get_html_translation_table(HTML_ENTITIES);
00227                 foreach($htmltable as $key => $value) {
00228                         $mixed = ereg_replace(addslashes($value),$key,$mixed);
00229                 }
00230                 return $mixed;
00231         }       
00232         
00242         public static function debugMessage($message,$extended = true) {
00243                 session_start();
00244                 if($_SESSION['mailformplusplusSettings']['debugMode']) {
00245                         if($extended) {
00246                                 $message = "#######################################<br />".$message."<br />#######################################<br />";
00247                         }
00248                         print $message."<br />";
00249                 }
00250         }
00251         
00260         public static function debugArray($arr) {
00261                 if(!is_array($arr)) {
00262                         return;
00263                 }
00264                 foreach($arr as $key=>$value) {
00265                         if(is_array($value)) {
00266                                 $value = implode(",",$value);
00267                         }
00268                         $fields[] = $key."=".$value;
00269                 }
00270                 F3_MailformPlusPlus_StaticFuncs::debugMessage(implode("<br />",$fields),false);
00271         }

00283         public static function removeUnfilledMarkers($content) {
00284                 return preg_replace('/###.*?###/', '', $content);
00285         }
00286         
00295         public static function resolvePath($path) {
00296                 $path = explode("/",$path);
00297                 if(strpos($path[0],"EXT") > -1) {
00298                         $parts = explode(":",$path[0]);
00299                         $path[0] = t3lib_extMgm::extPath($parts[1]);
00300                 }
00301                 $path = implode("/",$path);
00302                 $path = str_replace("//","/",$path);
00303                 return $path;
00304         }
00305         
00314         public static function resolveRelPath($path) {
00315                 $path = explode("/",$path);
00316                 if(strpos($path[0],"EXT") > -1) {
00317                         $parts = explode(":",$path[0]);
00318                         $path[0] = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath($parts[1]);
00319                 }
00320                 $path = implode("/",$path);
00321                 $path = str_replace("//","/",$path);
00322                 return $path;
00323         }
00324         
00333         public static function resolveRelPathFromSiteRoot($path) {
00334                 $path = explode("/",$path);
00335                 if(strpos($path[0],"EXT") > -1) {
00336                         $parts = explode(":",$path[0]);
00337                         $path[0] = t3lib_extMgm::extRelPath($parts[1]);
00338                 }
00339                 $path = implode("/",$path);
00340                 $path = str_replace("//","/",$path);
00341                 $path = str_replace("../","",$path);
00342                 return $path;
00343         }
